name: SeekPanda, Inc.
description: Developer of a language service platform designed to connect clients with the top linguist talents and technologies. The company's language platform uses big data with a human touch to translate languages and its real-time translation increases the speeds of multilingual meetings, enabling corporate and other organizations to browse, find and hire language translators and interpreters and translate their conferences.
one_liner: Developer of a language service platform designed to connect clients with the top linguist talents and technologies. The company's language platform uses big data with a human touch to translate languages and its real-time translation increases the speeds of multilingual meetings, enabling corporate and other organizations to browse, find and hire language translators and interpreters and translate their conferences.
